This is an example of R code
```{r setup, include=TRUE}
# this is R code
summary(mtcars)
```
This is to include figures
```{r setup2, include=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
data("mtcars")
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=wt, y=mpg)) +
  geom_point()
```
